column2: you can Special Summon this card (from your hand)
column3: but it cannot attack this turn. You can only Special Summon "Archfiend Commander" once per turn this way. When Special Summoned this way: Target 1 "Archfiend" card you control; destroy that target. When this card is Tribute Summoned: You can target 1 Level 6 "Archfiend" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in face-up Defense Position.$Supports archetypes /Archfiend$$Activates from your hand/Activates upon Tribute Summon$Summon/Condition/Trigger$
